item.title: Road Relays
item.description: Southern Road Relays 2019 How do you win the Southern Road Relays. I decided to visualise the road relays leg times by teams so we can try and infere what it takes to win the road relays. The data from these plots are kindly taken from here. The plot below compares leg times for all competing teams. Long and short legs are displayed separately, and can be toggled between, hovering over a point should show a little more detail about the leg.
